parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID to establish user application is successful

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to ensure the timeliness of the request. Request to all channels is within 24 minutes

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API system using to identify user permission to the api, with its creation use and create of 1 hour

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated for requests at different sites

parameters.name: show_id
parameters.description: The show ID of the item

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if not exist. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if not error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for JWT request for error tracking
